Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute near Grand/Chicago
ShortDescription: 65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, Chicago, California and Grand: due to, street blockage near Grand/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Chicago, California and Grand: due to, street blockage near Grand/Chicago.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball-Homan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Kimball/Bloomingdale
ShortDescription: NB 82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, North Ave, Central Park, Armitage & Kimball: due to, street blockage near Kimball/Bloomingdale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #82 Kimball-Homan buses are temporarily rerouted via Kimball, North Ave, Central Park, Armitage and Kimball: due to, street blockage near Kimball/Bloomingdale.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Cottage Grove and Garfield
ShortDescription: Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Cottage Grove due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line service has been temporarily suspended between Garfield and Cottage Grove due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating only between Harlem/Lake and Ashland/63rd at this time.

Shuttle buses have been requested between Garfield and Cottage Grove to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
